en.header.title: Tre Fratelli Winery & Restaurant
en.hero.p: A family-run restaurant and winery celebrating the enogastronomic tradition of Valtellina, offering handcrafted wines and local dishes prepared with regional ingredients.
en.historia.p1: Tre Fratelli Winery & Restaurant was established in 1925 in Tirano, a small town in the beautiful Valtellina, Lombardy.
en.historia.p2: It all began with Giovanni Ferraro, the family patriarch, who inherited a small vineyard on the hills of San Stefano. Together with his three sons ‚Äî Marco, Paolo and Lorenzo ‚Äî he began cultivating Nebbiolo (Chiavennasca) grapes to produce an authentic artisan wine.
en.historia.p3: 1930s: Economic crisis and political instability made life difficult for the family. Teresa, the matriarch, opened a small kitchen for travellers on the Tirano railway, combining wine and local cuisine.
en.historia.p4: Second World War: Production was nearly halted; many barrels were hidden in stone caves to protect them from looting.
en.historia.p5: 1960s‚Äì70s: With the rise of alpine tourism, the grandchildren renovated the estate while keeping the family tradition alive.
en.historia.p6: 1980s: A new economic crisis threatened the business, but Alessandro, Giovanni's great-grandson, introduced innovations thanks to his oenology studies in Milan.
en.historia.p7: In 2025 the winery celebrates a century of history. The fourth generation of the Ferraro family continues to preserve the same passion for hospitality, wine and good food.
en.vino1.titolo: Nebbiolo of the Alps ‚Äì Tre Fratelli Reserve
en.vino1.p: A mountain Nebbiolo with a bold, deep character ‚Äî an authentic expression of Valtellina's terraced vineyards.
en.vino2.p: An elegant, harmonious wine that captures the essence of the territory and pairs perfectly with local dishes.
en.vino3.p: Dedicated to Teresa, the founder of the family kitchen: an intense, fragrant sforzato rich in tradition.
en.visite.p: Discover our history, taste our handcrafted wines and admire the alpine landscapes and terraced vineyards around Tirano.
en.footer.desc: In the heart of Valtellina, among vineyards and alpine mountains.
